item.description:
Evan Gershkovich has written exclusive accounts of the Kremlin‚Äôs war efforts, profiled Russian dissidents and reported from Russian border towns on the toll of the Ukraine war.

Read a selection of his work here. on.wsj.com/48cEVbE on.wsj.com/48cEVbE
